content.rendered:
Make a Wish With Cake Candles in Every Color, Shape, and Size!

Light up their cake and wish big with decorative candles by Papyrus. Our uniquely crafted candles make spectacular, sparkling displays for cakes, cupcakes, and all kinds of celebrations. With cheerful colors, festive patterns, and shapes of every size (including numbers!) you can personalize cake toppers for anyone. From birthdays to bon voyage, they’re going to love blowing out these candles!

Our website hosts a curated selection of a few of our favorite designs. Check back frequently for updates and additions. Until then, head to a retailer near you to shop for hundreds more!
